net.akaish.kitty.orm.annotations

Annotation Type KITTY_DATABASE_HELPER


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Inherited
public @interface KITTY_DATABASE_HELPER
    Annotation for databaseClass helpers configuration Created by akaish on 04.03.18.
    Author:
    akaish (Denis Bogomolov)
